Articles.Content:
Hey everyone,today we'll be playing a funny game called Construct-o-Testament(i made that name up).

So you post something as if it were someones testament.

And remember:Its about Jebediah!

Let me start off.

Today i landed on a space burrito with my (go on and create a funny testament )
I regret that this thread went into existence.

I was wrong about what a testament was

Ignore this.

Edited July 8, 2013 by Agent30632

Well, you might try telling us then.

Last I checked, "testament" didn't have an exact definition. Could be wrong, but this certainly doesn't seem like anything I've seen called a "testament."

Turns out, it's a will. Let's make it one, shall we?

I, Jebediah Kerman...
...offer one of my boosters, at high speed, to the Munbase (don't worry - it's on it's way already)...
